1.content: Starting off, What are you?
1.title: The beginning

choices: You get there without any further problems
11.content: You are a man in your early twenties who has dedicated your life to the martial arts. You have been trained in the ancient ways of self defense and preservation ever since you were a young boy. You are considered a protigy by your peers and your master takes great pride in your teachings. However, you are known for one thing in particular, your kicking. Your kicks have developed into something so deadly you have been forced to register them as lethal weapons. The nickname by which everyone knows you is, The Kicking Demon. Even with all these accolades however, you find it more important to be humble, honorable and live by a strong moral code. Your life has become pretty mundane and predictable lately, but that is about to change. Your master has been out of town all week on business, so you have been teaching class in his place. As the day comes to an end you say your goodbyes to all your fellow students as they leave and you lock up for the evening. You begin walking home, you own a car but you find it better for the enviornment and your physical fitness that you walk. As you are walking you look up at the stars, pondering all of life's great mysteries as you normally do to pass the time when suddenly you hear a loud thundering sound right in front of you. You drop your tote bag full of your martial arts equipment taking a defensive stance, ready to face whatever it is that's in front of you. As you take a closer look however it seems like some sort of greenish swirling portal. As you look closer and closer it begins to pull you in, you however maintain a strong stance remembering your training, but the suction is too strong and eventually you are overwhelmed and are swallowed by the portal along with your tote bag removing any evidence that you had been there and just as you are swallowed up the portal dissappears. The question at this point is, do you merely get hurled into the Sonic Universe, or does something else happen to you along the way?
11.title: Martial Artist

112.content: Okay, you are tranformed, but into what?
112.title: You are transformed

1121.content: As you plummet through the portal you feel very bizarre. You are getting a tingling sensation all over your body. You can feel yourself changing, even down to your DNA. You pass out as you fall further and further down into the depths of the portal. Where in the world of Sonic do you end up?
1121.title: Hedgehog

11211.content:
As you come to and everything comes into focus, you find yourself laying in a large grassy field. You

prop yourself up and try to gain your bearings but something just doesn't feel right. You look at your

hands and notice that you are now wearing gloves, but that's not it. Your hands are a lot bigger than

they were before. You look down and see that the same thing has happened to your feet, they're huge.

You start to freak out a little and notice that there's a pond close by. You crawl frantically to it to look at

your reflection and what you see shocks you to your core. You're a four foot tall, blonde furred, blue

eyed hedgehog! You stagger away from the pond and fall flat on your but stammering. “H-how can this

be possible”! You exclaim. “I'M A GODDAMN FURBALL”! You shout as you flop onto the ground.

You start breathing in and out deeply to calm your nerves. “Okay, I'm a hedgehog. Nothing I can do

about it at the moment” You say standing back up. “First thing I need to do is try to find some form of

civilization....and hopefully find some way to reverse this”. You begin walking only to trip and fall over

your pant legs that are now way too long for you. You look at your clothes and realize that they are far

too big and baggy for you. “Well this isn't going to work” you say. You rip the sleeves of your top and

rip the pant legs from your pants to match your new height. As you toss away your shreds of discarded

clothing you see your tote bag with all your gear in it. 'Oh sweet' you think to yourself as you reach into

your tote and grab your ninja-to (ninja sword) and tie it to your waist. You then grab the tote and throw

it over your shoulder. “Now to find some help” you say as you begin your trek. You walk and walk for

what seems like hours. 'God, it feels like I'm a hamster on wheel here' you think. 'I know if I go at a

faster pace I'll make better progress, but if I run and exhaust all my energy without finding any help I'll

be in serious trouble....What should I do'? You think.
11211.title: The Realization

choices: You make it to the castle
112112.content:
You finally decide 'You know what, screw it, I've got to find help before nightfall, and if I don't, then

I'll just make some sort of make-shift campsite out of whatever I can find' you think to yourself. “I'll

just have to be careful” you say to yourself as you begin to lightly jog for a minute. You then pick up

the pace and begin to run for a while. 'Huh' you think 'That's strange, all this running and I'm not even

the least bit tired.....I wonder'. As you think this you start running as fast as you can. When you do,

what you see surprises you, you're fast as hell! “HOLY CRAP”! You say out loud as you come to a

stop. You look at your new body from top to bottom. “Well, I guess this body has it's advantages” you

say as you take a running stance and SCWHOOM begin running at such a fast pace you are leaving a

trail of yellow light behind you. “THIS IS AWESOME”!!! You say as you zoom across the grassy

plains. At this new pace it takes no time at all for you to see what looks like a city ahead. You stop to

look at it from a distance to see if you should seek help there. As you look closer you see a sign that

says “Knothole Kingdom” you look down upon this kingdom to see a wide array of houses and markets

along the streets as well as it's many inhabitants, all encompassed by a large protective wall. However,

what really catches your attention is the gigantic castle in the middle of it all. “It certainly looks

promising enough” you say as you approach it. As you reach the entrance to the kingdom you are

confronted by two guards who look like rhinos. “Halt”. Says the one on the right. “State your

business”. “I was hoping I could get some help” you reply. “You see, I woke up in some field after I

was sucked through a weird po-” “That's enough”! exclaims the one on the left as he interrupts you.

“We will have you escorted to the Princess, she will decide your fate”. “But first we will need to

confiscate your sword and bag” The one on the right says as he goes to grab your sword. You step back

placing a hand on the blade “No one...touches...the sword” you say with a serious look on your face.

The two guards grab their axes, ready to take it by force if necessary. “Hold it”. Says another voice

from above you. You look up to see another guard but in a different colored armor on top of the wall.

“Let him keep it” he says “If he tries anything we'll take him down”. “Yes sir” say the guards in front

of you in unison. “Private Briggs, Private Staple”! Yells the one on the left. Two more guards run up

and salute him. “Yes sir”! They both say. “Escort him to the Princess so that she may pass judgment”.

Says the guard while looking at you. “Yes sir” they say again. “Follow us” says one of them. You nod

and begin to do so, while still staying on your guard. You look back up to the guard on top of the wall,

remembering what he had said before 'If he tries anything we'll take him down' you think. 'As if you

could' while keeping one hand on your blade just in case. You continue to make your way to

the castle all the while being watched and observed by the citizens. “What's their problem”? You ask

one of the guards in front of you. “The people here are always suspicious of newcomers, don't take it

personally”. She replies. “I guess I can't blame them, considering the way I look” you say looking at

your torn martial arts uniform. “You look fine to me” replies the female guard as she winks at you.

“Uh, thanks” you say while the other guard just rolls his eyes at his comrades behavior. What happens

now? Do you make it to the castle without a hitch, or is there going to be trouble?
112112.title: Knothole Kingdom

1121121.content:
You make it to the castle without any further problems. As the guards lead you down the corridor

leading to the throne room of their Princess, you begin to ponder 'I wonder what this Princess is like. I

certainly hope she isn't hostile'. The female guard looks to you again seeing the look of concern on your

face “Don't worry dear, the Princess is very kind. I'm sure she'll be willing to hear you out”. She says

with a smile. “That's IF we can even trust him” says the other guard. “Just ignore him” she says “He's

suspicious of everybody”. “Thank you for your kindness” you reply. “It is always nice to meet someone

who is willing to open their heart to a stranger” you say looking at her. “Aw, well your welcome sugar.

See, how can someone that polite possibly be up to no good” she says to her fellow guard. “You never

know” he says looking back at you. “In any case, we're here”. He says standing in front of an enormous

wooden door. CLANG CLANG CLANG he knocks with the door handle. “You may enter” says a

rather sultry voice. The door suddenly creeks open and you are escorted in by the two guards. As you

walk in you notice how lavish and exquisite everything within the room is. From the velvet red carpet,

to the marble floor and columns, all the way up to the ceiling adorned with paintings that could rival

DaVinci, and in the center was a large golden chandelier with diamond crystals hanging from it.

“Wow” is all you can say. You then look towards the end of the room to see the person who was to

decide your fate. There she was, sitting on her magnificent throne. Upon closer inspection you could

see that she was a squirrel wearing a blue vest and blue boots. 'Hmm, not the usual look of royalty I

was expecting' you think to yourself'. “Well, this is quite a surprise” says the Princess. “When I was

told to be expecting a hedgehog, you weren't exactly who I was expecting”. “Your highness” says the

male guard. “This hedgehog was trying to enter the kingdom for unknown reasons, so we brought him

here to see what you wanted us to do with him” he states. “Hmmm” the Princess thinks out loud

looking you up and down intently. “Well, if anything, I'd say your outfit is definitely unique” she says

chuckling “Oh my where are my manners, I am Princess Sally Alicia Acorn” she says as she walks

closer to you. “And you are...” she inquires “Oh”, you stammer for a moment “My name is Ryan, Ryan

Cordaine” you say bowing to her out of respect for her position as Princess. “It's a pleasure to meet you

your highness” you say as you take her hand and kiss it. “My, you certainly are quite the gentleman

aren't you” she says blushing. From up close you can make out all the details of her figure and begin

thinking to yourself. 'Wow, you know, now that I get a closer look at her, her eyes, her hair, she's

actually really pretty' as your face turns slightly red. “So, tell me Mr. Cordaine, why have you come to

my kingdom”? She asks breaking your train of thought. “Ahem” you say clearing your throat. “I um,

actually came here seeking help” you say. “Oh”? She asks. “What kind of help”? “It's a long story your

highness”. “I have time” she replies smiling at you “and please, call me Sally” “Heh, okay” you say

smiling back “but only if you call me Ryan”. “Deal” she says “You two” “Yes, your highness” they

both reply in unison as they bow. “You may leave” “B-but your highness, w-what if he-” “That's

enough” she interrupts. “If he was going to attack me he would've done it already, now go guard the

door” she says. “As you command your highness” they say reluctantly, closing the door behind them.

Sally walks over to a table and sits down, then pulls another chair close to her and motions for you to

come and sit. “Come and sit with me” she says. “Alright” you say as you walk over to her and sit down

at the table across from her. “So tell me” she says “what kind of help can I offer you”? You go on to tell

her all about your predicament, about the portal, the world you came from, and how you used to be

human. “Wow, you've certainly been through a lot” she says. “Tell me about it” you reply dropping

your head in despair. “My friends, my students, and my Master, I may never see them again” you say

choking up, tears forming in your eyes. “Hey” says Sally sympathetically embracing you in a hug. “It'll

be okay, I may not know how to get you back home, or revert you back to your human form, but you

are welcome to stay here with me until we figure it out”. “T-thank you” you say returning the hug. “In

the time that I've been in this world, no one has showed me as much kindness as you” “Anything I can

do to help” she says smiling back at you. You both break the hug and she asks “By the way, what's with

the strange clothes”? Looking at your sleeveless Gi top with Japanese writing on the back, torn pants

and the black belt around your waist. “Oh' heh” you say rubbing the back of your head. “Where I come

from this is the traditional attire of a martial artist”. “A martial what now”? She inquires scratching her

head. “You know, someone who's trained in the art of combat” you answer. “Oh okay, so your a really

good fighter then huh”? She asks putting her hands on her hips. “I'd like to think so” you say

nonchalantly. “Well then, mind giving me a demonstration” she asks moving closer to you. “Y-you

mean right now”? You ask taking a step back. “U huh” she says nodding. “Well....”
1121121.title: Princess Sally

11211211.content:
“I suppose so” you say hesitantly. “But, what exactly do you want me to do”? You ask. “Come with

me” says Sally as she grabs your hand and makes for the door. She flings the door open and says to the

guards “Get the Commander to meet me in the courtyard please”. “Yes your highness” they say as they

make their way to the Commander's post. “What do you suppose that was all about”? one of them asks.

“No idea, but she seemed pretty wound up, it's best to just do what she says when she gets like this”

replies the other. Sally, still holding your hand takes you to the courtyard. Once there, you notice all the

statues and flower arrangements placed about. “This is beautiful” you say as you take it all in. “Thanks,

I had the gardeners make it to my exact specifications” she says as you both begin to sit and wait for

the Commander to arrive. You begin to look up at the sky, thinking about the world you were taken

from. “It's almost eery how much this world reminds me of my own” you say as you continue to look

up at the sky. “Really”? asks Sally. “Yeah” you reply. “The blue skies, the luscious green grass, the

trees and the plants, they all look so similar” you say. “Well that's good, just remember that you're

welcome to stay here as long as you like Ryan”. She says smiling at you. “Thank you” you say “I hope

you don't mind me asking though....” “Go ahead” she says. “Please don't take this the wrong way Sally

but, why are you being so nice, I mean, as a Princess I'm sure you get pleas for help all the time. So

why was my case any different”? You ask looking at her inquisitively. “Oh, well umm...” She says

surprised you asked her something like that. At this point she has her head down looking at her boots,

twiddling her fingers nervously. “Y-you see, I um...” she continues to stammer “I get awfully lonely

being in this big castle all by myself, a-and I was just hoping you might um, stay for a little while. She's

still looking at the ground and you ask “But why me of all people”? “Well...” She says, her face turning

red now. “Princess, yous summoned me”? Says the Commander as he enters the courtyard and bows to

Sally. “Oh, y-yes yes, I...did..” She says catching her breath after being startled by the big rhino. “What

is it you need your majesty”? He asks. “I want you to have a sparring match with our guest” she replied

pointing at you. “What” you say slightly confused. “That is, if it's okay with you Ryan” she says

winking at you. “I don't mind, but-” “But what”? She interrupts, leaning in closer to you. “But, I don't

want to hurt anyone”. You say. “HA”! Laughs the Commander. “Like you could hurt me” he says as he

approaches you and Sally. You then notice 'Wait a minute, this is the same guy from earlier, the one that

was on top of the wall' you think. “Lets do it” you tell him as you look into his eyes with a very serious

look on your face. “Great”! Exclaims Sally, I'll just watch from over here, try not to hurt each other too

bad okay”. “Yes your highness” says the Commander. “Alright” you say smiling at her as she waves to

you taking her seat. “Good luck”! She yells to you. You give her a thumbs up, reassuring her you would

be okay. You untied your sword and placed it on the bench next to you, you wanted to fight this guy,

not kill him. “Here's the rules” he says “we continue to fight until one of us gives up, gets knocked out,

or cant get up for a ten count”. “Sounds good to me” you say as you bow to him. “I hate to have to

make you look bad in front of the Princess and all, but I do have my orders” he says. “No hard

feelings” you say smiling at him “Do what you have to do”. “Alright then, you asked for it”! He says

as he charges at you. 'If my strength has increased as much as my speed' you think 'then I'm going to

have to be extremely careful that I don't kill this guy by accident'. He throws a punch but you side step

it easily. He throws a few more and you avoid them again just as easily. “No more fooling around” he

says as he throws a barrage of punches at you. You continue to move about dodging all of his strikes

with little effort. “Your punches are strong and precise, but brute strength alone isn't going to get you

anywhere if your opponent has any kind of speed” you say. “Grrr...” is all he says as he continues his

assault, but it's apparent that he's beginning to run out of steam as he slows down. “Looks like you need

to work on your stamina a little bit too” you say. “Just shut up and fight back already”! The

Commander exclaims. “If you say so” you reply. You form a fist and bring it to within an inch of his

chest and lightly tap it within the blink of an eye. “GWAH”! Is all you hear as he is sent flying back

and lands ten feet away with a THUD. 'HOLY CRAP'! You think as you look at your hand and back to

him. 'I did THAT'! You run over to him to see if he was okay. “Oh man! Are you alright”? You ask.

“Ugh” is all he says. “He's out cold” you say. “Ryan”! Yells Sally as she runs up to you. “Is he okay”?

She asks. “Yeah, he's out like a light, but he'll be okay once he comes to” you reply. “That was

amazing”! She exclaims. “You knocked him out with one punch and you weren't even trying”. “Don't

worry big guy” you say as you lift him up, putting an arm over your shoulder. “Where can I take him so

he can rest”? You ask Sally. “Oh, come with me. The infirmary is this way. You drop off the

unconscious rhino and begin walking with Sally back to the main chamber of the castle. “How did you

do that so easily”? She inquires. “He was the Commander of the entire Royal Guard. He was the best I

had”. “I...have no idea” you say looking at your hands. 'This new body has abilities I could never even

DREAM of attaining back in my world' you think. “I don't know about you, but I sure am hungry” says

Sally. At that moment your stomach grumbled at the mention of food. “Y-yeah” you say embarrassed,

“I guess I'm hungry too. I haven't eaten anything since I came to this world”. Sally giggles pulling out

a small cell phone looking device from her vest pocket. “Nicole” she says. “Yes Sally”? Replies a

female voice. “Have the chefs begin preparations for dinner please”. “Right away Sally”. “Thanks

Nicole, Oh, and before I forget, have a couple of the servants prepare a room for our guest Ryan”. “Of

course” says Nicole as the screen goes black. “What's that”? You ask. “That's the first piece of

technology I've seen since I've been here”. “This”? She replies holding up the device. “This is Nicole,

she's a computer program I made myself”.You both make it to the main chamber of the castle and Sally

goes on to tell you about her advancements in technology and all about Nicole. “Wow” you say “You

must be really smart”. “Heh heh, thanks” she says as she twirls her hair with her finger. “Your majesty”

calls the chef, “dinner is ready”. “Great” she says clasping her hands together. “Lets go” she says

motioning for you to come with her. As you make it to the dining room you are shocked at the wide

array of pallets displayed across the table. You both take a seat and she says “Go ahead, eat as much as

you like” smiling at you hospitably. “Don't mind if I do” you say, mouth watering. You begin shoveling

food in your mouth like it's nobodies business. This makes Sally giggle, seeing your lack of table

etiquette. “Fwhats fscho ffunny” you say, mouth full of food. “Oh nothing” she says as she begins

eating.
11211211.title: The Demo...

11212.content: You crash into the ocean awakening immedently. You swam as fast as you can to the surface. Emerging from underwater you take a deep breathe. In a few seconds you started swimming to the beach. When you arrive on the beach and start to regain your bearings. You bring your hand up and wipe some excess water from your eyelinds. After finishing wiping it you set you hand back on the sand a few seconds later your eyes widened from relisation. Looking down at your hand you see it's larger and have white gloves on them. You examine the rest of your body and even check your reflection in the crystal clear water of the bleach. You were now a four foot black hedgehog with red stripes running along your arms legs and quills You also had a black trenchcoat with various metal straps. You took many minutes to calm yourself. "Oh what else can go wrong." you ask putting your hand back on the sand. But you palm landed on something solid. Looking down you saw a red chaos emerald in your hand and your eyes widened before it started glowing in a bright white light. After it the light faded you were bomarded by information about chaos power andhow to control and manipulate fire.
11212.title: Beaches

1123.content: Alright then how about these?
1123.title: Other

11233.content: Hmmm....Okay then, how about this one?
11233.title: Other

112332.content: Man your picky, what do you think of this one?
112332.title: No thanks

1123322.content: Fine then! How's this one?
1123322.title: Next!

11233222.content: Okay how about a dog?
11233222.title: Are you kidding?

info.brief_description: You find yourself plunged into the world of Sonic and his friends. What will you do?
info.description:
You are a boy, girl, man, or woman who finds yourself plunged into the world of Sonic and his friends. What will you do?

I'll allow sex and killing to a cerain extent. Just don't go crazy with it. No killing the main character. No M/M activity. I have nothing against it, I just don't want it in this interactive. I'll allow certain fetishes into the story as well depending on what they are, but like with the killing and sex, don't go crazy with it. All in all I want this interactive to be action/adventure and romance based. I'll address what I will and won't allow as the story grows. Also, if you read, please add to the story. I'm only one person, I can't do it by myself. :'(

Read, rate, review, add to the story, and ENJOY! XD
